name: Chef
description:
Control you Chef with the W key (Move Left) and the D key (Move Right).

Look at what your customers are ordering and try to cook the food to their linking.

When the food bounces from the frying pan, it gets more cooked. 

Do not bounce it too many times or it will burn up! 

Let the food hit the ground so that it can be delivered to the customers.

Be careful! If you make too many customers upset, you will lose the game
